thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 13 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: MedReleaf reports Q3 loss per share of C$0.05

author: Reuters Editorial
title: MedReleaf reports Q3 loss per share of C$0.05
text:
Feb 13 (Reuters) - Medreleaf Corp:
* MEDRELEAF REPORTS THIRD QUARTER FISCAL 2018 RESULTS * QTRLY SALES OF $11.4 MILLION, AN INCREASE OF 9% FROM PRIOR YEAR PERIOD
* QTRLY LOSS PER SHARE C$0.05 ‍​ * AT END OF DEC 31, 2017, CO HAD CASH AND CASH EQUIVALENTS OF $114.6 MILLION, WORKING CAPITAL OF $137.9 MILLION
* Q3 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW C$-0.01 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q3 REVENUE VIEW C$11.2 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
